sentences: Ms. A. Tcheknavorian-Asenbauer said industries in developing countries must be helped to improve competitiveness through energy efficiency, an area where UNIDO can help.
UNESCO: Gisbert Glaser noted that the objectives of the Convention cannot be achieved without science, education, internationally coordinated research and global monitoring efforts.
UNESCO can contribute through its programmes on oceans, the earth crust, ecosystems and freshwater resources.
enb_long_title: First Conference of the Parties to the Framework Convention on Climate Change
